FuncDef:
The datafill command fills padding characters into the Data field of packets to be sent in an NQA UDP jitter test instance.
The undo datafill command disables a device from filling padding characters into the Data field of packets to be sent in an NQA UDP jitter test instance. The datafill command fills padding characters into the Data field of packets to be sent in an NQA UDP jitter test instance. The undo datafill command disables a device from filling padding characters into the Data field of packets to be sent in an NQA UDP jitter test instance. By default, there are no padding characters in the Data field.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the padding characters filled into NQA test packets.
The value is a string of 1 to 230 characters. The default value is a null string with no characters.

ExtraInfo: To fill special padding characters into the Data field of the test packets to be sent for identification, run the datafill command.
